data.name: Detail.Accept
data.value: Do you want to accept analytics cookies?

data.name: Detail.AnalyticsCookiePurpose1
data.value: This cookie is a Google Analytics persistent cookie which is used to distinguish unique visitors.

data.name: Detail.AnalyticsCookiePurpose2
data.value: This cookie is used to throttle request rate. These are third party cookies that are placed on your device to allow us to use the Google Analytics service. These cookies are used to collect information about how visitors use our website. We use this information to compile reports and to help us improve the website.

data.name: Detail.EssentialCookiePurpose2
data.value: Saves your responses so you have a better experience.

data.name: Detail.EssentialCookiePurpose3
data.value: This is an anti-forgery token and is used to prevent cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks. It prevents others from forging your website links.

data.name: Detail.EssentialCookiesDescription
data.value: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use this service. We do not need to ask permission to use them.

data.name: Detail.AnalyticalCookiesDescription1
data.value: With your permission, we use Google Analytics to collect data about how you use this service. This information helps us to improve our service.

data.name: Detail.AnalyticalCookiesDescription2
data.value: Google is not allowed to use or share our analytics data with anyone.

data.name: Detail.AnalyticalCookiesDescription3
data.value: Google Analytics stores anonymised information about:

data.name: Detail.AnalyticalCookiesPoint2
data.value: how long you spend on each page

data.name: Detail.AnalyticalCookiesPoint3
data.value: how you arrived at the site

data.name: Detail.AnalyticalCookiesPoint4
data.value: what you click on while you visit the site

data.name: Detail.AnalyticalCookiesPoint5
data.value: the device and browser you use

data.name: Detail.CookieDescription1
data.value: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.

data.name: Detail.CookieDescription2
data.value: We use cookies to make the list of large producers on the ‘report packaging data’ work and collect information about how you use our service.
